\subsection{Tabel Distribusi Frekuensi}

```{r tabel_z, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=TRUE}

library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(readxl)


Tabel_Distribusi_Frekuensi <- read_excel("data_and_code/Tabel_Distribusi_Frekuensi.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Tabel_Z", skip = 2)

names(Tabel_Distribusi_Frekuensi)[9] <- 0.07 

opts <- options(knitr.kable.NA="")


kable(Tabel_Distribusi_Frekuensi,"latex", longtable=T, booktabs=TRUE, linesep="", caption="Z-Score.\\label{hujan-max}") %>% kable_styling(latex_options=c("HOLD_position","repeat_header"),font_size=10,repeat_header_text = "\\textit{(lanjutan)}")

```
